message:
Dell xps 15/16 or MacBook pro 2015 ? ( Android studio :3 )
* I'm going to run ubuntu on any of them

data.message: If you're going to run Ubuntu anyway then go with the XPS, Ubuntu doesn't support some of the Mac drivers, but why you're thinking of Ubuntu on a MacBook?
Ø·Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§ Ù‡ØªØ´ØªØºÙ„ Ø§ÙˆØ¨Ù†ØªÙˆ ÙŠØ¨Ù‚ÙŠ ÙˆÙØ± ÙÙ„ÙˆØ³Ùƒ ÙˆØ§Ø´ØªØ±ÙŠ  dell Ø¨Ø³ Ù„Ùˆ Ø§Ù†Ø§ Ù‡Ø®ØªØ§Ø± Ù…Ø§Ùƒ Ø·Ø¨Ø¹Ø§
People buy Apple products for the software .. since you will use Ubuntu in both cases go for XPS with no doubt

I tried the Mac OS before and i didn't like it ( closed environment ) and been with Ubuntu for a lot and everything is good and available , so why change ? Plus everything on Mac costs money ğŸ˜‚ , bs my question is hardware and quality

HP Elite Book Folio 1040 G3 
And fuck both :D

(Unless you want to live the MacOS experience)
I think buying a Mac to run Ubuntu on it is a waste of money.

I have XPS 13 with Ubuntu and I like it. The Macbook Pro (not the latest version) is highly rated too but people usually buy it because of MacOS, so if you don't want it then there's no point in shelling out that kind of money. And I agree the SSD is the single most important component so be sure to invest in one.
in my opinion, If you're going Ubuntu anyway then go for the XPS,  in Macbooks you pay for both the Hardware and the Software. And if you're not going to use MacOS anyway so it's going to be a waste.
Dell XPS 13 , check what Linus trovaldes said about it
If you are not planning to develop for apple products (iOS, mac OS, etc) then don't go for mac

I have both: XPS 13 developer edition for work and the new MacBook Pro for personal use. They have similar specs. The XPS comes with Ubuntu preinstalled so all drivers work and it also sports a touch screen, yet it's much cheaper than the Mac.
The new XPS 15 is way better than Macbook Pro and cheaper.

I don't recommend XPS. It has heating issues. I had XPS 15 inch before and sold it after a year.

Mac book pro is fantastic but if you gonna run Ubuntu it's waste of money
